features: Made of 100% Polyester Material:Temporary blackout blinds is made of thick, sturdy but soft fabric materials which block out all lights coming through the window,opaque thermal insulation coating blocks all lights and UV entering the room, It fits perfectly without gaps around the window. Keep your room cooler in summer; warmer in winter. improve sleep quality for baby, children or adults.

High Quality PU Nano-Adhesive: travel blackout curtains with nano tapes, strong sticky, easy to apply and will no adhesive residue on window/frame.leaving no marks at all after removal.Tips: The glass window needs to be wiped clean. In the case of dust, the transparent silicone sticker will fail to stick to it, and it will not stick to the wall with dust. It is recommended to paste it on a clean glass window for better effect.

Lightweight in a Handy Travel Bag: Travel blackout shades compact folded size and light weight makes it so easy to pack, store, carry and transport, exceptionally convenient for families, travellers, and renters.you will fall asleep just feel like at home even you’re on holiday or business trip

Blackout Blinds Multiple Usages: The room darkening window shades are perfect for the bedroom, study, kitchen, living room, office, bathroom, garage, den, family room, and so on.Just attach it directly to glass windows/doors using the super strong suction cups, you will have a dark sleeping environment or private space instantly,regardless wherever you are.

Precautions for using blackout curtains: machine wash cold and line dry; do not bleach, iron, or dry clean,Measures 118 * 57 inches,Free to cut to perfectly fit any size and shape of windows. Note: Leave a 2-3cm edge to prevent light from entering through the edge when cutting,When using the product, if you have any questions, you can contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose our Black Blinds? The Petaholic now has a new EASY fix system with hook and loop fastener tab attachments. The curtain will easily attach to a window/window frame or door and be adapted to fit most window sizes. The curtains have been designed to overlap window frames to eliminate the light that somehow manages to creep around the edge of a regular blind or curtain. The curtains are made from a lightweight durable ripstop fabric and can easily be installed, removed and stored, making them an excellent product to use at home or when you travel. Great for Traveling or Home use Nurserieshook and loop fastener tab attachments supplied to fit all windowsDesigned to be attached to window frames, door frames and windowsLightweight Ripstop PU MaterialTravel Bag Included- Blinds fold down and packaway into compact bag

Fast Fit and Strong with two type paste This blackout curtain is quick and easy to install using recycled tape on your window frame or window glass.It can be removed without leaving a mark. 100% Shading Material Blackout Curtains are made of thick, strong but soft fabric material, double waterproof, full of drape, can block 100% of sunlight and UV rays. Thanks to the special silver-grey coating behind the blackout blinds; block sunlight, reduce heat, create a comfortable dark sleep environment for you, and improve sleep quality. Cut Any Shape you like You can draw your favourite pattern on the black oxford clothDIY your own shading cloth at will.
Clean the window Measure size of the window Measur size of window Attach hook and loop fastener to frame and blind

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for price
reviews.reviewText: Other than the velcro coming off due to the heat, the secondary transparent adhesive worked better. It made a noticeable difference in the reduction heat, darkness and cooling required. You can make it look nice or even as a quick install with rough cuts it still does the job. This has made it significantly more pleasant to work by the balcony sliding glass doors, plus at night time it is pitch black, great for movies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No light coming thru!
reviews.reviewText: We built in a new neighborhood not realizing that a street lamp was being installed right outside the guest bedroom. We needed a quick solution for visiting family. The blackout material was easy to install. It did fall down the first night but that was because I was trying to use minimal adhesive strips, only using two. Once I added two at the bottom as well, it hasn't fallen since. It is nice and dark for sleeping. I consider this only a temporary solution until I can get heavier drapes made. I wouldn't want to have to take this down everyday, but I guess you easily could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quick fix
reviews.reviewText: Needed a solution to block light in the nursery and this worked great! Easy to cut and install. Only gave 4 stars because the velcro adhesive kept falling off our wall (we tie the curtain to let light in during the day) but a couple of push pins fixed the issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really is 100% blackout
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my nursery because the curtains that I bought were falsely marketed as blackout curtains. This product comes in one long sheet (like a thick shower curtain material), has a slight chemical odor, and a project to cut into smaller window squares. BUT easy to stick to the window, stays in place, and really is 100% blackout! I cut into smaller halves of the window squares to be up against the glass and the adhesive provided works wonderfully! 10 out of 10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great window covers
reviews.reviewText: These were perfect for window coverings that I needed to cut to fit for size. I loved that it came with the Velcro fasteners. That was very helpful and I am extremely pleased with the entire product and nice quality. It keeps the area cool when hot and warm when cold, plus it's lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: It came in a big sheet and I just cut the material to size for our window. It helped prevent so much glare and definitely keeps all the light out! The sticky pads that it came with work phenomenal and can be removed if you ever want to take it down or move it. Which I was surprised about, I thought they would for sure strip the paint on the walls or something, but it didn't. I love these and would use these over curtains to be honest. They're pretty cheap also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works great, but...
reviews.reviewText: These blackout mechanisms work as advertised. Little to no light gets into my room; HOWEVER, there's a STRONG chemical smell. If it weren't for the awful smell, I would give it 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well.
reviews.reviewText: These were easy to install, are easy to take down when needed, and work extremely well. I put them up a couple of months ago, and haven't had light problems since then.
Easy to apply to the windows and perfect to block out the light. My partner loves them.
